sidebarToolComponents.name: Measure
sidebarToolComponents.description: This tool will allow for the measurement of distance and areas in various units.

sidebarToolComponents.name: Coordinates
sidebarToolComponents.description: Get coordinates throughout the map in a variety of different coordinate systems.

sidebarToolComponents.name: Print
sidebarToolComponents.description: This tool allows users to print their map view in a variety of formats such as pdf and jpeg.

sidebarToolComponents.name: Search Addresses
sidebarToolComponents.description: This tool allows you to search Addresses.

sidebarToolComponents.name: Search History
sidebarToolComponents.description: This tool provides users with a list of their 25 most recent searches.

sidebarToolComponents.name: Lot And Concession
sidebarToolComponents.description: This tool allows you to search Lot and Concessions.

sidebarToolComponents.name: External Services (Street View)
sidebarToolComponents.description: This tool links a map location to many other External Map Services.

sidebarToolComponents.name: Weather
sidebarToolComponents.description: Radar and Weather forecast from Environment Canada.
